meanings: (무대 등에) [명사] appearance, [동사] appear, make an appearance, come on
the appearance[introduction, debut] of a new product

vlive.korean: 깜짝 등장할래? Do you want to be on it? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: Do you want to be on it?

vlive.korean: 진짜? - 깜짝 등장할래? Really? - Do you want to join us? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: Really? - Do you want to join us?

vlive.korean: [팬싸 소품 화환 등장] 우진 씨, 뭐 쓸래요? [Item from a fan signing event] WOOJIN, what will you use? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 답을 줘가 벌써 막방일 리가 없썽.. 시간 돌려줭..😭😭 (AB6IX’s V after last performance for ‘THE ANSWER’)
vlive.english: [Item from a fan signing event] WOOJIN, what will you use?

vlive.korean: [새로운 음식 등장] 맛있어? [New food appears] Is it good? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “MORE & MORE” Comeback Week #2
저희가 배경에 등장하는 건가요? Is that us in the background? 듣기 View video NCT : 나른쟌
vlive.english: Is that us in the background?

examples.korean: She was applauded as she came on stage. 발음듣기 그녀는 무대에 등장하면서 박수를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was applauded as she came on stage. 발음

examples.korean: The arrival of canals was of great value to many industries. 발음듣기 운하의 등장은 많은 산업들에 대단히 유용했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The arrival of canals was of great value to many industries. 발음

examples.korean: In the theatre we willingly suspend disbelief. 발음듣기 극장에서는 우리가 기꺼이 불신을 유예한다(등장인물 등이 현실적이라고 믿는다). Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the theatre we willingly suspend disbelief. 발음

examples.korean: The novel was criticized for its two-dimensional characters. 발음듣기 그 소설은 2차원적인[입체적이지 못한] 등장인물들 때문에 비판을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The novel was criticized for its two-dimensional characters. 발음

examples.korean: The hero makes his entrance in Scene 2. 발음듣기 남자 주인공은 2장에 등장한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hero makes his entrance in Scene 2. 발음
